wargear.name: Belt of Russ
rules: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear.name: Frost Weapon
rules: Add 1 to the Strength and Damage of this model's weapon(s)

abilities.rules: Each time the bearer fights, it makes 3 additional attack with this weapon. No more than 3 attacks can be made with this weapon.

abilities.name: Chapter Master
rules: In your Command phase, select one friendly CORE or CHARACTER within 6" of this model. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you may re-roll the hit roll.

abilities.name: ((Rites of Battle))
rules: While a friendly CORE unit is within 6" of this model, it may re-roll a hit rolls of 1.

abilities.name: The Imperium's Sword
rules: You may re-roll charge rolls for this unit.
Each time this unit fights, if it made a charge move or performed a Heroic Intervention this turn, then until that fight phase is resolved, add 1 to its Strength and Attacks characteristics.

abilities.name: Hunter
rules: +1 to Advance and Charge rolls for this unit.
This unit is eligible to charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back

abilities.name: (2CP) Only In Death Does Duty End
abilities.rules: Fight: If this unit has not fought this phase, upon death, it may fight after its attacker has finished making attacks.

meleePreAttackChecks.name: The Imperium's Sword
rules: If this model's unit made a charge move or a Heroic Intervention this turn, models in this unit get +1 Strength and +1 Attacks until that fight is resolved.
